original_title: The Secret Love Life of the Urban Leopard
overview: The Secret Love Life of the Urban Leopard is a wildlife mockumentary which follows an underground community throughout their everyday life in Berlin. They are the urban leopards, endangered and fabulous. Narrated like a real wildlife film, it introduces the lifestyle, sexual and eating habits, and camouflage skills of it's leopard printed heroes.
tagline: An Educational Erotica About the Berlin Wildlife
title: The Secret Love Life of the Urban Leopard
